thread.title: Staff Accountant Immediate opening for highly motivated (pic)
thread.title_full: Staff Accountant Immediate opening for highly motivated (pic)

title: Staff Accountant Immediate opening for highly motivated (pic)
text:
Staff Accountant Immediate opening for highly motivated ad date: 10/21/2015 
Staff Accountant Immediate opening for highly motivated self-starter to fill the Staff Accountant job opening at South Coast Lumber Company. The position involves account reconciliations, fixed asset management, performing various analysis, assisting with month-end close, supporting the CFO and Chief Accountant as well as other duties as assigned. Accuracy, confidentiality and comfort using systems are a must. The ideal candidate will have a 4 year accounting degree with a minimum of two years post-college accounting related experience. Experience in the wood products industry is a plus but not required. Pay is commensurate with experience and qualifications. South Coast Lumber offers very attractive benefits as well as a retirement package. EOE. Send resume to:
